const Http: Http = {

        })
    },
    post(url, params) {

            NProgress.start()
            axios
                .post(url, JSON.stringify(params))
                .then((res) => {
                    NProgress.done()
                    resolve(res.data)
                })
                .catch((err) => {
                    NProgress.done()
                    reject(err.data)
                })
        })
    },
    upload(url, file) {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            NProgress.start()
            axios
                .post(url, file, {
                    headers: {'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'},
                })
                .then((res) => {
                    NProgress.done()
                    resolve(res.data)
                })
                .catch((err) => {
                    NProgress.done()
                    reject(err.data)
                })
        })
    },
    download(url) {
        const iframe = document.createElement('iframe')
        iframe.style.display = 'none'
        iframe.src = url
        iframe.onload = function () {
            document.body.removeChild(iframe)
        }
        document.body.appendChild(iframe)
    },
